SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.handlers

Class CollisionHandler

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.handlers.CollisionHandler
public class CollisionHandler extends Object
Handles collisions between various entities in the game. Manages collision detection and response for friendly units, enemy units, projectiles, and powerups.
See Also:

      Checks if an enemy unit has passed the screen border.
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy unit
      screenWidth - the width of the screen
      Returns:
      true if the enemy is past the screen border, false otherwise
